snippet: While campaigning, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo vowed to maintain a transparent administration, but his executive chamber prides itself on leaving few footprints.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, who had vowed to maintain a transparent administration, has set up an executive chamber with his aides that prides itself on leaving few footprints; Cuomo often communicates with his aides through untraceable BlackBerry PIN messages, no delicate subjects are discussed in e-mail, and in-boxes are regularly wiped clean.
lead_paragraph: While campaigning, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo vowed to maintain a transparent administration, but his executive chamber prides itself on leaving few footprints.

headline.seo: Despite Cuomo’s Promises of Transparency, His E-Mail Trail Is Elusive
headline.main: Despite Cuomo’s Vow of Sunlight, a Bid to Keep Aides’ E-Mail in the Dark
headline.print_headline: Despite Cuomo’s Vow of Sunlight, a Bid to Keep Aides’ E-Mail in the Dark
